title: SOMEONE PLEASE PLAY SOME GAMES WITH ME
body: I am on a 2 week losing spree i have no fuckin clue why the fuck i cant win a game no matter how hard i try

replies.body:
how long has it been since you had a devil teemo profile picture?

Imma guess 2 weeks
i exaggerated but look at my match history its not too far from the truth feelsbadman

I'll play i guess, i've been playing a lot of fill, etc etc.
add this account and we can duo q :^)
